name: Trustmeimagmae.exe
description:
You've fall in the oldest of tricks:  you installed an infested software!

Close all the pop ups before you're flooded! Some just need the click, others need you to wait, and others need you to close other pop ups before. Cleanse and win!

------------------

Developed in 18hs in the Argentina Train Jam 2018

Credits:

Francisco Delledone - Bruno Martìnez - Mer Grazzini - Pablo Sire Canaveris - Luli Vigliano
